record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that during the time controlled by the Democrats this afternoon, the following be recognized to speak for up to 10 minutes each, except where noted, and that each side alternate when appropriate: Boxer, Murray, Dodd, 15 minutes; Kerry, 15 minutes; Nelson of Florida, Reed, Harkin, and Whitehouse.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
